metadata.title: CVE-2019-19010 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Eval injection in the Math plugin of Limnoria (before 2019.11.09) andSupybot (through 2018-05-09) allows remote unprivileged attackers todisclose information or possibly have unspecified other impact via the calcand icalc IRC commands.

criterions.comment: limnoria: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
